This is the main class for Axion, a tool for working with NBT.

The AxionConfiguration class manages all the user-definable configuration state for an Axion instance.

Creates a new AxionConfiguration instance with AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode.Unlocked.

Creates a new AxionConfiguration instance with the given AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode.
AxionConfiguration.CharacterEncodingType - Enum in com.sudoplay.axion
The character encoding type that an AxionConfiguration will use to read and write strings with the AxionInputStream.readString() and AxionOutputStream.writeString(String) methods.
AxionConfiguration.CompressionType - Enum in com.sudoplay.axion
The compression type that an AxionConfiguration will use to read and write when accessing the underlying streams.
